name: E.A.T.
description:
The Eating Arcade Times, or EAT, is an arcade styled game as the submission for the ScoreSpace Game Jam #20, with the theme of: ABSORB

F-Fullscreen

M-Mute

Type the key according to the number above a solid food to ABSORB it a little. Continuously ABSORB to eat it. Press on drinks to ABSORB them. Score is on the top. If a food item has not been ABSORBED for 7 Seconds, it is game over. Try to get the highest score possible and show off to your friends... and stuff...

HOPE YOU ENJOY THE EATING ARCADE TIMES :) 

(Made using Godot Engine, Sound with BFXR, Music via Incredibox (v1), Sound Tweaks using Audacity and Art with Aseprite)
